input.sentences: the lady and her husband are having a picnic at the park
these are their kids that seem to be enjoying themselves
this is their youngest child playing with his mom
this is their second oldest daughter who lying on a blanket listening to music
at dark we enjoyed beautiful fire works .
output.sentences: Sarah and John decided to go to the park for a Fourth of July picnic.
They really hadn't expected to see so many families with children.
Screaming moms and hungry babies were everywhere.
Some of the children were happy just to watch everyone in the crowd.
When the sky became dark enough not just the babies were screaming as the crowd oohed and aahed at the fireworks display.
